content.question: Which of the following is true of the bureaucracy in Mexico?

choices.label: It is a major source of employment within Mexico.
The National Action Party (PAN) has effectively cut back on bureaucratic corruption.
Oil is no longer controlled by the government bureaucracy.
The North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) has caused an increase in bureaucratic inefficiency.
It has become smaller since the increase in microcredit programs.

content.answer: It is a major source of employment within Mexico.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
